# Portfolio of Anagh K R

## Summary
Anagh K R is a freelance Full-Stack Developer and Flutter Developer based in Kerala, India. He specializes in building high-performance web and mobile applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) and Flutter.

## Services
- **Web Development**: Custom websites, e-commerce platforms, and web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js.
- **Mobile App Development**: Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android using Flutter.
- **UI/UX Design**: Modern and responsive designs focused on user experience.
- **SEO & Optimization**: Performance tuning and search engine optimization for better visibility.
- **Consultation**: Technical advice on architecture and technology stack selection.

## Locations Served
Anagh serves clients across Kerala, including:
- Kochi
- Thiruvananthapuram
- Kozhikode (Calicut)
- Thrissur
- Kannur
- Kollam
- Kasaragod
- Palakkad
- Ernakulam
- Kanhangad

- **GitHub**: https://github.com/anagh534
